name: Ball Challenge - Are You Ready?
description:

Ball Challenge is also on STEAM (25% OFF!! and EXTRAS OFFERS!!)

Are you ready to accept this challenge and show how agile you are?

With a retro pixel art look, Ball Challenge is a HARD game that requires a lot of skill and agility from the player to go through all it's challenges. Dodge monsters, spikes and traps, collect the necessary diamonds and try to reach the end of each level.

Controls:
  • Hold the left mouse button to aim. Release it to move the ball;
  • Right mouse button: cancel the movement;
  • R: restart the level;
  • ESC: pause;
